item.title: AI capitalism
item.description: tags Capitalism, Artificial Intelligence (Verdegem 2022) Bibliography Pieter Verdegem. April 9, 2022. "Dismantling AI Capitalism: The Commons as an Alternative to the Power Concentration of Big Tech". AI & SOCIETY. DOI.
